<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pursuant to a Loan and Security Agreement (LSA) we entered into with a financial institution. Pursuant to the terms of the LSA, we made monthly interest-only payments for outstanding borrowings at an interest rate equal to the greater of (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	prime
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or (b)&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	until the LSA was amended in December 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In December 2014, we entered into a First Amendment to Loan and Security Agreement, and in February 2015 and October 2015 we entered into a Second and Third Amendment to Loan and Security Agreement (collectively, &#x201C;the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	*As of December 31, 2015, we have the ability to borrow under Tranche D.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our ability to borrow under Tranche C is conditioned upon meeting certain clinical trial milestones, which must be met by March 31, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;The availability end date for Tranches C and D is March 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In connection with the Amended LSA, we borrowed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million available to us under Tranche B in December 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of December 31, 2015, and pursuant to the terms of the Amended LSA, we were required to make monthly interest-only payments for all outstanding borrowings at an interest rate equal to the greater of (a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	prime
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	rate plus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or (b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6.5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	until March 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;Commencing in April 2016 and continuing through March 2018, we are required to make monthly payments of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1/24th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;of our principal borrowings plus interest.&nbsp;&nbsp;In January 2016, we achieved certain clinical trial milestones, that resulted in the extension of both the interest-only period and principal maturity dates by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December 31, 2015, of our outstanding term loan balance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$7.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	mill
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ion, $1.8 milli
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on will be due within the next twelve months, and is classified as the current portion of notes payable on our balance sheet.&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest expense related to the term loans was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$461
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	thousand and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$117
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	thousand for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of December 31, 2015, we had accrued interest of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$39
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	thousand.&nbsp;&nbsp;There are no financial covenants associated with these term loans.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of December 31, 2015, we were in compliance with all non-financial covenants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7. Stock Option and Incentive Plans
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In 2005, we adopted the 2005 Stock Option and Incentive Plan (2005 Plan) that authorizes us to grant options, restricted stock and other equity-based awards. As of December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	549,287
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	options to purchase shares of common stock were outstanding pursuant to grants in connection with the 2005 Plan.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional shares are available for issuance under the 2005 Plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;The amount, terms of grants, and exercisability provisions are determined and set by our board of directors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	13
</FONT>

	NOTES TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Effective August 2014, we adopted our 2014 Equity Incentive Plan (2014 Plan) that authorizes us to grant options, restricted stock, and other equity-based awards, subject to adjustment in accordance with the 2014 Plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of December 31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,249,939
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	options to purchase shares of common stock were outstanding pursuant to grants in connection with the 2014 Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4,371
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock were available for future issuance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The amount, terms of grants, and exercisability provisions are determined and set by our board of directors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In accordance with the 2014 Plan, on January 1, 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	775,634
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock became available for future grant under the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	There were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,799,226
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options outstanding as of December 31, 2015 at a weighted average exercise price of $7.74 per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	Total compensation cost recognized for all stock option awards in the statements of operations is as follows (in thousands):

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Stock Options
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Options issued under both the 2005 Plan and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Plan may have a contractual life of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;years and may be exercisable in cash or as otherwise determined by the board of directors. Vesting generally occurs over a period of not greater than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. A summary of activity for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014 is presented below (in thousands, except share and per share amounts):

	NOTES TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The aggregate intrinsic values in the preceding table represent the total intrinsic value that would have been received had all option holders exercised their options on December&nbsp;31, 2015. Intrinsic value is determined by calculating the difference between the fair value of our common stock on the last day of the year and the exercise price, multiplied by the number of options.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;average grant date fair value of options granted was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$8.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$6.09
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share in 2015 and 2014, respectively, and was estimated at the date of grant using the Black
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Scholes option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;pricing model with the following weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;average assumptions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The weighted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;average valuation assumptions were determined as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected stock price volatility: The expected volatility is based on historical volatilities of similar entities within our industry which were commensurate with our expected term assumption as described in the SEC&#x2019;s Staff Accounting Bulletin, or SAB, No.&nbsp;107.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Expected term of options: We estimated the expected term of our stock options with service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;based vesting using the &#x201C;simplified&#x201D; method, as prescribed in SAB No.&nbsp;107, whereby the expected life equals the average of the vesting tranches and the original contractual term of the option due to our lack of sufficient historical data.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

</P>
</TD>

</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;free interest rate: We base the risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;free interest rate on the interest rate payable on U.S. Treasury securities in effect at the time of grant for a period that is commensurate with the assumed expected option term.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	. Commitments and Contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Leases
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In October 2014, we entered into a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-year operating lease agreement for office space in Radnor, Pennsylvania.&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent payments under this lease commence May 1, 2015, with payment amounts escalating each May 1 thereafter through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the end of the lease term.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;In December 2015, we entered into a First Amendment to this lease agreement (Amended Lease) to lease approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8,500
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	rentable square feet of office space in Radnor, Pennsylvania.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Lease amends our existing lease agreement to replace our existing premises of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	rentable square feet of office space, and we are expected to commence leasing the larger office space in April 2016.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Rent payments under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Amended Lease are expected to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	commence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	June
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, with payment amounts escalating each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	June
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1 thereafter through the end of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	62
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-month
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lease term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	November
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we entered into a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year operating lease agreement f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	r office space in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Madison
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, Connecticut
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	annual renewal options of one year each.&nbsp;&nbsp;Rent payments under this lease commenced on November 1, 2015, and increase with each renewal period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Prior to that and through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	October 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we leased a facility in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	New Haven
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, Connecticut. Rent expense under these operati
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ng leases, in thousands, was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$143
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015 and 2014, respectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. All leases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are non-cancelable.
</FONT>

	1,654
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contractual Obligations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In June 2015, we entered into a contract with a third party for up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million in clinical manufacturing supplies to support our ongoing clinical trials for ganaxolone.&nbsp; Delivery is expected to begin in the first quarter of 2016 and complete by the end of the year.&nbsp; In July 2015, we paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million of this commitment, which is recorded in prepaid expenses and other current assets as of December 31, 2015.&nbsp;The balance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million is due in 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Employee Benefit Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We maintain a Section&nbsp;401(k) retirement plan for all employees. Employees can contribute up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	50%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of their eligible pay, subject to maximum amounts allowed under law. We may make discretionary profit sharing contributions, which vest over a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years from each employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s commencement of employment with us. We have not made any discretionary contributions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	License Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We are obligated to pay royalties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	pursuant to a license agreement with Purdue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as a percentage of net product sales for direct licensed products, such as ganaxolone. The obligation to pay royalties expires, on a country
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;country basis,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;years from the first commercial sale of a licensed product in each country. The agreement also requires that we pay Purdue a percentage of the non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;royalty consideration that we receive from a sublicensee and a percentage of milestone payments for indications other than seizure disorders and vascular migraine headaches not associated with mood disorders. Under the license agreement, we are committed to use commercially reasonable efforts to develop and commercialize at least one licensed product.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MARINUS PHARMACEUTICALS,&nbsp;INC.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTES TO FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9. Income Taxes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we had approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$93
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$68
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, respectively, of net operating loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	NOL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, carry forwards available to offset future federal and state taxable income that will expire beginning in 202
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. We also have federal research and development credit carryovers of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and state credit carryovers of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million which expire beginning in 2019.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The NOL carry forwards are subject to review and possible adjustment by the Internal Revenue Service and state tax authorities. NOL, and tax credit carry forwards may become subject to an annual limitation in the event of certain cumulative changes in the ownership interest of significant stockholders over a three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209; year period in excess of 50%, as defined under Sections&nbsp;382 and 383 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, or the Code, as well as similar state tax provisions. This could limit the amount of NOLs that we can utilize annually to offset future taxable income or tax liabilities. The amount of the annual limitation, if any, will be determined based on the value of our company immediately prior to an ownership change. Subsequent ownership changes may further affect the limitation in future years. Additionally, U.S. tax laws limit the time during which these carry forwards may be applied against future taxes, therefore, we may not be able to take full advantage of these carry forwards for federal income tax purposes. We are currently evaluating the ownership history of our company to determine if there were any ownership changes as defined under Section&nbsp;382(g) of the Code and the effects any ownership change may have had.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The components of the net deferred tax asset are as follows (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In assessing the realizability of deferred tax assets, management considers whether it is more likely than not that some portion or all of the deferred income tax assets will not be realized. The ultimate realization of deferred income tax assets is dependent upon the generation of future taxable income during the periods in which those temporary differences become deductible. Management considers the scheduled reversal of deferred income tax liabilities, projected future taxable income, and tax planning strategies in making this assessment. Based on consideration of these items, management has determined that enough uncertainty exists relative to the realization of the deferred income tax asset balances to warrant the application of a full valuation allowance as of December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The valuation allowance increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million during the years ended December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively, due primarily to the generation of NOLs during those periods.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

	MARINUS PHARMACEUTICALS,&nbsp;INC.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We did
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	have unrecognized tax benefits as of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and do not expect this to change significantly over the next twelve months.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We recognize tax positions in the financial statements only when it is more likely than not that the position will be sustained on examination by the relevant taxing authority based on the technical merits of the position. A position that meets this standard is measured at the largest amount of benefit that will more likely than not be realized on settlement. A liability is established for differences between positions taken in a tax return and amounts recognized in the financial statements. Accrued interest and penalties, where appropriate, are recorded i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n income tax expense. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	did
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uncertain tax positions as of December 31, 2015 and 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. As of December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	accrued interest or penalties related to any uncertain tax positions. Our tax returns filed since inception are still subject to examination by major tax jurisdictions.
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

	0.0

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	For all years through December&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, we generated research credits but have not conducted a study to document the qualified activities. This study may result in an adjustment to our research and development credit carryforwards; however, until a study is completed and any adjustment is known,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	amounts are being presented as an uncertain tax position for these years. A full valuation allowance has been provided against our research and development credits and, if an adjustment is required, this adjustment to the deferred tax asset established for the research and development credit carryforwards would be offset by an adjustment to the valuation allowance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We file income tax returns in the United States, the State of Connecticut, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. The federal and state income tax returns are generally subject to tax examinations for the tax years ended December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	through December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. To the extent we have tax attribute carryforwards, the tax years in which the attribute was generated may still be adjusted upon examination by the Internal Revenue Service or state tax authorities to the extent utilized in a future period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s)&nbsp;and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15(d)-15(f)) for the registrant and have:

</TR>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;

<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
	1.

<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:36PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
